localizations.en.title: Overwhelm Part 2: How to Fight the Paper Monster
localizations.en.description:
Hello brains!

Thanks for your patience on this one, I think I underestimated my paper monster (and overestimated my ability to run 2 cameras, tackle paper clutter, and explain how to tackle paper clutter all at the same time). Hope you enjoy Overwhelm Part 2 and that this video helps you as much as having to make it helped me!!

What to keep: https://www.dailyworth.com/posts/3513-when-to-throw-away-financial-documents

P.S. -- I got a P.O. Box! And I'm all caught up on my mail now, so I'd love to get more! (no food stuffs please) 

Jessica @ How to ADHD
P.O. Box 1526
Guasti, CA 91743-9001

P.P.S. -- I did a more fun "unboxing" vid when I got the new equipment from YouTube. That's posted on Patreon if you wanna check it ouuuuut!

title: Overwhelm Part One: How to Tackle the Clutter
description:
Hello brains! I'm back from YouTube NextUP and just in time for the holidays! 

Chances are I'm not the only one dealing with overwhelm right now  (especially if it's your turn to entertain for the holidays!) So I enlisted (semi) professional help so we can tackle that clutter and clean our homes just in time for Thanksgiving. Or Christmas. Because, you know, procrastination.

Thank you for being patient with me while I was off learning all the things!! 

Fun Myers-Briggs type personality test: http://www.truity.com/test/type-finder-research-edition

Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Support me on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

ALSO!!
Check out all the YouTubers from creator camp, they're all making great stuff!!!

title: How to Figure Out Who to Vote For
description:
YAY FIRST BONUS VIDEO!!!

Do you know who you're voting for?

Besides president?

If not, watch to find out why those other names on the ballot matter and how to figure out which ones to vote for!

Also donuts. 

tweet your "I voted" sticker with #ADHDvotes

http://ballotpedia.org
http://votesmart.org

ALSO -- since politics tends to be really divisive (and DID in the five minutes I left them on!) I'm turning off comments for this one. Feel free to let me know what you think on the Facebook page or on Twitter :)

Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

Obama cameo by: http://youtube.com/iamreggiebrown

BTW this election is unusual in that both my candidates for Senate are Democrats. So a) I'm not deliberately leaving out the Republican option and b) sometimes voting party line isn't an option and you really do have to do your homework!

"the show must be go," "fearless first," "royal banana," "life of riley," "americana"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

title: 10 ADHD Myths That Just Won't DIE!
description:
Happy Halloween!!! Please share this one -- I'm busting 10 ADHD myths that just won't die!!

Printable PDF myth busting sheet: https://bit.ly/3F9Poat

What is ADHD, and why do people say it doesn't exist: http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/05/09/what-is-adhd_n_1500294.html

American Psychiatric Association. (2015). Diagnostic and statistical manual of mental disorders (5th ed ed.). Washington, DC: Author.
Asherson, P., Buitelaar, J., Faraone, S. V., & Rohde, L. A. (2016). Adult attention-defi cit hyperactivity disorder: key conceptual issues. Lancet Psychiatry, 3(1), 568-578. 
Castellanos, F. X., & Tannock, R. (2002). Neuroscience of attention deficit/hyperactivity disorder: The search for endophenotypes. Nature Reviews Neuroscience, 3(1), 617-628. 
Doernberg, E., & Hollander, E. (2016). Neurodevelopmental disoders (ASD and ADHD): DSM-5, ICD-10, and ICD-11. CNS Spectrums, 21(1), 295-299. 
Gallo, E. F., & Posner, J. (2016). Moving towards causality in attention-defi cit hyperactivity disorder: overview of neural and genetic mechanisms. Lancet Psychiatry, 3(1), 555-567. 
Konrad, K., & Eickhoff, S. B. (2010). Is the ADHD brain wired differenctly? A review on structural and functional connectivity in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder. Human Brain Mapping, 31(1), 904-916. 
Rommelse, N., Vander Kruijs, M., Damhuis, J., Hoek, I., Smeets, S., Antshel, K. M., . . . Faraone, S. V. (2016). An evidenced-based perspective on the validity ofattention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder in the context of highintelligence. Neuroscience and Biobehavioral Reviews, 71(1), 21-47.


Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd


"The Show Must Be Go,” "Attack of the Molemen," "Clash Defiant," "Enter the Maze"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

“The Future Begins Today” 
by Brett Van Donsel

title: Why Perfectionism Isn't Perfect -- and How to Overcome It
description:
I'm totally aware of the irony of posting a video about perfectionism  five days late.   I'm working on accepting not being perfect.  It's hard.  I'm probably going to watch this video more than any of you.

Of course... I'm posting it at 4am because I stayed up all night trying to get it just right sooooooo...I'm also working on accepting that I'm not going to be perfect at not trying to be perfect.

Progress?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

LINKS:


Brene Brown on vulnerability: https://www.ted.com/talks/brene_brown_on_vulnerability?language=en#t-1197560

The many faces of perfectionism: http://www.apa.org/monitor/nov03/manyfaces.aspx

The cost of perfectionism when you have ADHD: http://marlacummins.com/the-cost-of-perfectionism-when-you-have-adhd/

How adults with ADHD can let go of perfectionism: http://m.additudemag.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.additudemag.com%2Fadhd%2Farticle%2F2992.html&utm_referrer=#2569

The alarming new research on perfectionism: http://nymag.com/scienceofus/2014/09/alarming-new-research-on-perfectionism.html

title: 25,000 Subscriber Celebration + BIG NEWS
description:
Hello brains!!! 

This week, we're taking a break from ADHD tools and brain hacks to bring you a special 25,000 subscriber celebration -- PLUS some big news! 

I first came up with the idea for this channel 1 year ago, can't wait to see what this next year brings. :D

First video EVER (on goal setting!): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzbUcyNFjqA
Vid on resilience: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nwKtN1cZDto

Patreon brains and those who help out with the channel (by subtitling, etc.) got to see this one a day early --
If you'd like to help subtitle/translate send me an email: howtoadhd@gmail.com

And to support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd 

If you can't do either, that's fine too! I am so so grateful to all of you brains for watching, subscribing, commenting and sharing the videos, we would not have been able to come this far without you!!!

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd

This week, we're taking a break from ADHD tools and brain hacks to bring you a special 25,000 subscriber celebration -- PLUS some big news! 

I first came up with the idea for this channel 1 year ago, can't wait to see what this next year brings. :D

First video EVER (on goal setting!): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzbUcyNFjqA
Vid on resilience: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nwKtN1cZDto

Patreon brains and those who help out with the channel (by subtitling, etc.) got to see this one a day early --
If you'd like to help subtitle/translate send me an email: howtoadhd@gmail.com

And to support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd 

If you can't do either, that's fine too! I am so so grateful to all of you brains for watching, subscribing, commenting and sharing the videos, we would not have been able to come this far without you!!!

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd

title: How to Build Resilience: Quarters of Encouragement
description:
The secret to success, especially for those of us with ADHD, seems to be resilience. It doesn't matter how many times we fail, as long as we get back up. There are lots of ways to build resilience, but encouragement is one of the easiest and most powerful. Whether you or your ADHDer are struggling with grade school, friends, relationships, college or career, here are some ways to use "quarters" of encouragement to build the resilience necessary to keep bouncing back.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

LINKS:

Dr. Hallowell: “How One Teacher Changed My Life” http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/1605.html
Teaching resilience to ADHD children: http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/2525.html
The right kind of praise: http://www.additudemag.com/adhdblogs/11/9550.html
Building Resilience in Children: https://www.healthychildren.org/English/healthy-living/emotional-wellness/Building-Resilience/Pages/Building-Resilience-in-Children.aspx
How to Build a Child’s Self Esteem: http://www.adhdtogether.com/life-skills-with-adhd/how-build-self-esteem 
For ADHD adults: Silence Your Inner Critic http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/9572.html
Research paper: Reasons for Success and Implications for Resilience: https://www.deepdyve.com/lp/guilford-press/employment-of-adults-with-learning-disabilities-and-adhd-reasons-for-RpkfBC58Pg?articleList=%2Fsearch%3Fquery%3Dresilience%2Badhd
Not just about resilience, but found this and loved it — “Adult ADHD: 50 tips of management” http://www.drhallowell.com/adult-adhd-50-tips-of-management/

How to caption a video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjCU0gr18g8

localizations.de.title: Durchhaltevermögen aufbauen - Ermutigungsmünzen
localizations.de.description:
Der Schlüssel zum Erfolg ist - vor allem für die unter uns mit ADHS - Durchhaltevermögen. Es ist egal, wie oft wir hinfallen, so lange wir wieder aufstehen. Es gibt viele Wege, sein Durchhaltevermögen zu verbessern, aber Ermutigung ist einer der einfachsten und wirkungsvollsten. Wenn ihr oder euer ADHSler mit dem Abschluss, Freunden, Beziehungen, Uni oder der Karriere Probleme haben, findet ihr hier einige varianten, wie ihr "Ermutigungsmünzen" nutzen könnt, um das nötige Durchhaltevermögen zum Dranbleiben aufzubauen.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Unterstützt uns auf Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

LINKS (alle Quellen sind Englisch):

Dr. Hallowell: “Wie ein Lehrer mein Leben veränderte” http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/1605.html
ADHS-Kindern Durchhaltevermögen beibringen: http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/2525.html
Die richtige Art zu loben: http://www.additudemag.com/adhdblogs/11/9550.html
Durchhaltevermögen bei Kindern aufbauen: https://www.healthychildren.org/English/healthy-living/emotional-wellness/Building-Resilience/Pages/Building-Resilience-in-Children.aspx
Selbstvertrauen von Kindern aufbauen: http://www.adhdtogether.com/life-skills-with-adhd/how-build-self-esteem 
Für Erwachsene mit ADHS: Den inneren Kritiker zum Schweigen bringen http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/9572.html
Forschungspapier: Gründe für den Erfolg und die Auswirkungen von Resilienz: https://www.deepdyve.com/lp/guilford-press/employment-of-adults-with-learning-disabilities-and-adhd-reasons-for-RpkfBC58Pg?articleList=%2Fsearch%3Fquery%3Dresilience%2Badhd

localizations.it.title: Come costruire la determinazione: monete di incoraggiamento
localizations.it.description:
Il segreto per il successo, specialmente per coloro affetti da ADHD, sembra essere la determinazione. Non importa quante volte falliamo, fintanto che ci rialziamo. Ci sono molti modi per costruire la determinazione, ma l'incoraggiamento è uno dei metodi più facili e potenti. Che tu o la persona affetta da ADHD stiate avendo difficoltà con i voti a suola, gli amici, le relazioni, l'università o la carriera lavorativa, qui ci sono delle "monete" di incoraggiamento per costruire la determinazione necessaria a tornare a rimettersi in piedi.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Supportateci su Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

title: Am I a Failure?
description:
It's hard to build a successful career when your ADHD symptoms keep getting in the way and you've always felt like a failure.

title: Hands On Review of the Fidget Cube
description:
QUICK! Watch THIS video too! You'll be glad you did ;) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uEHYIeml98M

*IMPORTANT* -- there are a lot of knockoffs of the Fidget Cube already available that aren't good quality, and I even found one that was ripping off *this video* to advertise them. The actual Fidget Cube is only available on Kickstarter through Antsy Labs. If you find a place where you can buy one today, it's a knockoff. 

I was one of the first to get to try out the Fidget Cube! This is my hands on review of the fidget toy taking Kickstarter by storm.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

Videos mentioned in this episode:

Fidget Cube Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/antsylabs/fidget-cube-a-vinyl-desk-toy

RESOURCES

articles on how fidgeting helps with focus: http://www.scilearn.com/blog/fidgeting-helps-adhd-students-learn

title: How to Help Someone who has ADHD
description:
Hello hearts who love ADHD brains!  This week's video is all about YOU – we know how frustrating life with us can be, and this video has a bunch of helpful tips for loving and living with an ADHD brain!  By the end of this video you should have a better understanding of ADHD and how to help someone who has it. Thank you for your patience, from the bottoms of our hearts! 

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

Videos mentioned in this episode:

Schedule things that aren’t urgent: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jxiCV...

How to deal with meltdowns: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yfg3T...

ADHD impulsivity and building up our “brakes”: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Aq7R...

Gamification: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YxsAx...

10 favorite things about ADHD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wFCKa...

Fidget to Focus: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=71PB_...

LINKS!

my 10 favorite resources for ADHD (video): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a4YMm...

Below are links ADHD brains recommend: 

RESOURCES

http://chadd.org

http://additudemag.com (check out ADDitude Connect to post questions and get answers!)

http://www.russellbarkley.org/factshe...

http://www.adhdkidsrock.com/

http://www.addcoach4u.com/resources.html


BOOKS

Driven to Distraction: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B005GFII62/...

ADHD Effect on Marriage: https://www.amazon.com/ADHD-Effect-Ma...


"The Show Must Be Go”, "Life of Riley"

localizations.de.title: Wie du jemanden mit ADHS helfen kannst
localizations.de.description:
Hallo Freunde von ADHS! In dem Video von dieser Woche, dreht sich alles um DICH - wir wissen, wie frustrierend das Leben mit uns sein kann, und dieses Video enthält eine Reihe hilfreicher Tipps, um mit einem ADHS-Kopf zu leben! Am Ende dieses Videos solltst Du ADHS besser verstehen und betroffene helfen können. Lieben Dank für deine Geduld.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

localizations.es.description:
Hola corazones que aman el cerebro TDAH! El video de esta semana es todo sobre usted - sabemos lo frustrante vida con nosotros puede ser, y este video tiene un montón de consejos útiles para amar y vivir con un cerebro TDAH! Al final de este video usted debe tener una mejor comprensión del TDAH y cómo ayudar a alguien que lo tiene. Gracias por su paciencia, desde el fondo de nuestros corazones!

title: My 10 Favorite Things About Having ADHD
description:
There are many strengths that go along with our ADHD symptoms. Which strengths you have and express will depend on a lot of factors, and it's not the same for everybody, but here are my 10 favorite things about having ADHD that have been true for me, I've found in my research and I see in many other ADHDers too.

Also -- to be clear I am NOT saying ADHD is not a challenge or a legitimate disorder. I am not saying we shouldn't get treatment. I am on Vyvanse myself and a big believer in multimodal treatment so that we can overcome those challenges and enjoy our strengths.




"How to Know if You Have ADHD"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx13a2-unjE

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
Support us on Patreon: http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

"ADHD is not a failed version of normal" from my podcast with Jennie from SeeinADHD: http://www.seeinadhd.com/adhd-via-video/
ADHD coach Eric Tivers: http://www.erictivers.com/podcast


17 things to love about ADHD:
http://www.additudemag.com/slideshow/119/slide-1.html

Seven Habits of Highly Successful Entrepreneurs With ADHD:
https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/entrepreneurs-adhd/200909/seven-habits-highly-successful-entrepreneurs-adhd

10 successful people with ADHD:
http://elitedaily.com/money/10-successful-people-adhd/

ADHD: The Entrepreneur’s Superpower
http://www.forbes.com/sites/dalearcher/2014/05/14/adhd-the-entrepreneurs-superpower/#3a18e7317063

Celebrities with ADHD:
http://m.additudemag.com/?utm_source=FacebookAds&utm_medium=Mobile&utm_term=ADHD&utm_content=Phelps&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.additudemag.com%2Fslideshow%2F67%2Fslide-1.html%3Futm_source%3DFacebookAds%26utm_medium%3DMobile%26utm_term%3DADHD%26utm_content%3DPhelps&utm_referrer=http%3A%2F%2Fm.facebook.com#2816

Is the ADHD brain more creative?
https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/here-there-and-everywhere/201106/is-the-adhd-brain-more-creative

http://www.hallowellnyc.com/HallowellNYC/LivingwithADD/BenefitsYesBenefitsofHavingADDA/index.cfm
http://www.healthline.com/health/adhd/benefits-of-adhd#3

Helen Steele on how ADHD is a gift (interview):
http://www.hadd.ie/article/helen-steele-fashion-designer-artist-how-adhd-gift-0

Top 10 Advantages of ADHD in a High Tech Career:
http://adultaddstrengths.com/2006/02/09/top-10-advantages-of-add-in-a-high-tech-career/

10 Surprising Facts About People With ADHD:
http://inspiyr.com/benefits-of-adhd/

localizations.nl.title: Mijn 10 favoriete dingen aan het hebben van ADHD
localizations.nl.description:
Er zijn veel sterktes die samengaan met onze ADHD-symptomen. Welke sterktes jij hebt en tot uiting brengt hangt af van vele verschillende factoren, en dat is niet hetzelfde voor iedereen, maar hier zijn mijn 10 favoriete dingen aan het hebben van ADHD die waar zijn geweest voor mij, die ik gevonden heb in mijn onderzoek en die ik ook zie in vele andere ADHDers. 

En nog dit - om duidelijk te zijn, ik zeg NIET dat ADHD geen uitdaging of legitieme handicap is. Ik zeg niet dat we geen medicatie moeten nemen. Ik ben zelf op Vyvanse and heb een groot geloof in een multimodale aanpak zodat we de uitdaging kunnen aangaan en van onze sterktes kunnen genieten.



"How to Know if You Have ADHD"

localizations.sv.title: Mina 10  Favorit Saker Med Att Ha ADHD
localizations.sv.description:
Det finns många styrkor som kommer med våra ADHD-symptom. Vilka styrkor du har och uttrycker, beror på många faktorer, och det är inte samma för alla, men här är mina 10 favorit saker med att ha ADHD som har varit sant för mig, detta har jag hittat i min forskning och jag ser i många andra ADHDers också.

Också - för att vara tydlig säger jag inte att ADHD inte är en utmaning eller en legitim sjukdom. Jag säger inte att vi inte ska få behandling. Jag är på Vyvanse själv och en stor anhängare av multimodal behandling så att vi kan övervinna dessa utmaningar och njuta av våra styrkor.

localizations.ko.title: ADHD 가 있어서 좋은 이유 10가지
localizations.ko.description:
ADHD 증상과 함께 오는 강점들이 많이 있습니다. 여러분이 어떤 강점을 갖는가, 어떤 것이 표현되는가는 여러가지 요인에 따라 달라집니다. 그리고 모두에게 똑같지 않아요. 하지만 제가 제일 좋아하는 이유들을 소개합니다. 저에게 적용되는 것들이었고, 조사 결과 많은 ADHD인들에게서도 발견되는 이유들이에요.

또 분명히 하자만, ADHD가 장애물이 아니라거나, 진짜 질병이 아니라는 말을 하는 게 결코!! 아닙니다. 치료나 도움을 받지 말아야 한다는 게 아니에요. 저 역시 Vyvanse를 복용하고 있고, 여러움들을 이겨내고 우리의 강점을 즐기기 위해서는 (약물과 더불어 상담 등의) 복합치료도 꼭 필요하다는 입장입니다.

title: How to Get School Accommodations
description:
Section 504 applies to students with ADHD, but some parents are still having trouble getting school accommodations. So the OCR wrote a letter. I'll read you my favorite parts of the new guidelines here and share what you can do to make sure your ADHD child gets their educational needs met.

Thanks to teacher brain Jo Meleca-Voigt for consulting on this video!

How to Improve Your Focus by Fidgeting
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=71PB_Rulk5M

The Full OCR Letter and Resource Guide - 
http://www2.ed.gov/about/offices/list/ocr/letters/colleague-201607-504-adhd.pdf

CHADD highlights the main points:
http://www.chadd.org/Understanding-ADHD/About-ADHD/ADHD-Weekly-Archive/Newsletter-Article.aspx?id=99

Know Your Rights: Students With ADHD:
http://www2.ed.gov/about/offices/list/ocr/docs/dcl-know-rights-201607-504.pdf

ADDitude mag's ebook:
http://additude.mybigcommerce.com/the-complete-iep-504-guide/?utm_source=eletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=august

Understanding Special Education Funding:
http://www.understandingspecialeducation.com/special-education-funding.html

Facebook: http://Facebook.com/howtoadhd
Patreon: http://Patreon.com/howtoadhd

title: Anger and ADHD: How to Build up Your Brakes
description:
Impulsivity is one of the main characteristics of ADHD, and building up our brakes is one of the most important things we can do. Here's the science behind it and 5 things that help.

title: ADHD and Friendships: How to Play the Social Game!
description:
The way ADHD brains develop can put us out of step with our childhood peers, leaving us feeling awkward, left out and with social anxiety that can follow us into adulthood. Here, I talk about my own experiences with that, and offer simple solutions.

**note -- I want to add that one of the Brains pointed out that peers and the internet aren't always the best source of information, which is true. Cultures vary, biases like racism and sexism exist, and also, well-meaning advice that might work for one person won't necessarily be appropriate for another. 

My hope is that we can sift through all the information available to us and check in with ourselves as to whether or not it feels right.

In any case, personally, if I'd known what to expect on a sleepover, how to be a good "host," or what appropriate etiquette is for a first date, I think I would have felt a lot more prepared to deal with the social situations I found myself in. 

****LINKS!****
http://bit.ly/2bbAhRp Podcast mentioned in the video —great info about playdates and more!
http://bit.ly/2bc9ckg Help Your Child with ADHD Make Friends
http://bit.ly/2aHW5kX Helping girls with ADHD make friends
http://bit.ly/2b5KiSE Friendship challenges for adults
http://bit.ly/2b3FKew ADHD brains mature a few years late 

And this is just for fun — one of the brains pointed out that reddit has an “outside” forum that treats the outside world like it’s actually a game. It’s AMAZING: http://bit.ly/2aX7RdQ

Help me make more videos! http://patreon.com/howtoadhd

"The Show Must Be Go," "Professor Umlaut"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0

title: How to Prioritize When You Have ADHD: The Matrix
description:

title: Why You Can Focus on Video Games (and How to Hack it)
description:
Can you or your ADHD child focus on video games for hours on end but when it comes time to study it's downright impossible? Here's why -- and what we can do about it. The kind of feedback video games provides can help us concentrate on homework, keep us from getting distracted in class, and improve our performance at work. Watch the video below (first link) to see this in action!

Positive feedback helps ADHD child do homework (supernanny!): http://bit.ly/29wIM6L
Positive reinforcement in ADHD kids: http://bit.ly/29BKM32
ADHD and video games: is there a link? http://wb.md/29PwaJU
a new kind of video game that might help: http://bit.ly/29CTriW
how to provide students with meaningful feedback: http://edut.to/29CTiME
Dr. Russell Barkley, PhD on feedback: http://bit.ly/29VB9M8
Coping with hyperfocus: http://www.healthline.com/health/adhd/adhd-symptoms-hyperfocus#3

By the way, if anyone's curious...the video game used in the demonstration is called "Glute Force" and was created by the one person I know won't sue me for showing his gameplay: Edward :D 
****Actual game coming soon!****


"The Show Must Be Go" "Shiny Tech"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0

title: EPIC FAQ Q&A 10,000 SUBSCRIBERS VIDEO
description:
We did it!  10,000 subscribers!  Here is our epic FAQ Q&A video!

In which I answer questions about my personal experience with ADHD, the meds I take (used to be Adderall, now on Vyvanse), and the level of anxiety that comes with having 10,000 subscribers!

Thanks to all the brains for their great questions.  I'll be answering more in the weeks to come, so leave your questions in the comments or on Facebook and Twitter!

Links mentioned:

How to Keep Focused on Your Goals in the New Year!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzbUcyNFjqA

How to Accident-Proof Your ADHD
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DParRGuDQoE


Ask me questions or suggest a topic!
Facebook: https://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: https://twitter.com/howtoadhd 

Music: 
“The Future Begins Today” 
by Brett Van Donsel

title: Think You Have ADHD?  How to Talk to Your Parents
description:
*** Links for more info ***

"But ADHD isn't real:" http://totallyadd.com/all-made-up/

ADHD is real, video by CHADD: https://www.facebook.com/chadd.org/videos/10157437026425691/

For kids: 
Tips on how to ask for help with an emotional or mental health issue: http://bit.ly/290KK0t

Tips for talking to your parents about ADHD: http://bit.ly/29jWRFr

For parents: 

What is ADHD:  http://bit.ly/294ionK

If your child does have ADHD: http://bit.ly/2932V7U

Why it might not be ADHD: http://bit.ly/2910dyU

The right way to get a diagnosis: http://www.additudemag.com/adhd/article/10597.html

Test for parents to take: a symptom checklist: http://bit.ly/290LVxU

Meds may reduce substance abuse: http://bit.ly/29jWjiW

Quick note: when I say proper treatment does not turn kids into zombies, I do not mean no medication has ever made kids feel that way, I mean the right treatment at the right dose shouldn't. I am on a dose of Vyvanse that works very well for me, but it took some time to find what worked.

Dr. Russell Barkley video — very long, completely worth it — “The 30 essential ideas every parent needs to know:” http://bit.ly/290KxdA

Links from the video: 
CHADD: http://www.chadd.org/
Understood: https://www.understood.org/en

"The Show Must Be Go" 
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

title: What Do We Do About Hate
description:
I should have been more clear in the video, when I'm talking about hate I'm talking about hate that results in aggression. 
And I was embarrassed to realize I'd said "sexual preference" when I meant "sexual orientation." 
This was an emotional video for me and I stumbled through expressing something I've never put into words. apologies for the mistakes.

The Orlando massacre was devastating, and what devestates me the most is that after every shooting we are horrified and then complacent. Myself included. 

I don't know if gun control can solve the problem. I think the puzzle is far more complicated than that. 

I don't know exactly what needs to be done.

But I know what I can do. 

I love Jimmy Fallon's piece as well: https://www.facebook.com/FallonTonight/videos/10154292540968896/?pnref=story
caption: true

localizations.de.title: Wir machen was wir hassen
localizations.de.description:
Ich hätte in dem Video deutlicher sein sollen - wenn ich über Hass rede, meine ich Hass, der in Aggressionen mündet.
Ich war peinlich berührt, als ich feststellte, dass ich "sexuelle Präferenz" statt "sexueller Orientierung" sagte.
Dies war ein sehr emotionales Video für mich und ich hatte Schwierigkeiten, die richtigen Worte für etwas zu finden, das ich noch nie ausgesprochen hatte. Entschuldigt meine Fehler in dem Video. 

Das Orlando Massaker war furchtbar. Mich entsetzt am meisten, dass wir nach jedem "Shooting" erst entsetzt und dann selbstgefällig sind. Ich selbst eingeschlossen.

Ich weiß nicht, ob ein Waffengesetz das Problem lösen kann. Ich glaube, dieses Puzzle ist viel komplizierter.

Ich kann nicht genau sagen, was getan werden  muss.

Aber ich weiß was ich machen kann.

Ich liebe Jimmy Fallon's Kommentar dazu: 
https://www.facebook.com/FallonTonight/videos/10154292540968896/?pnref=story
localizations.ko.title: 혐오에 대처하는 우리의 자세
localizations.ko.description:
영상에서 좀더 분명히 했어야 하는데, 여기서 '혐오'라는 단어는 폭력으로 드러나는 혐오를 말하는 것이었어요.

그리고 "성적 선호"라는 말을 사용했다는 사실에 부끄럽습니다. "성적 지향"을 말한 것이었어요.

저에게 무척 감정적인 영상이고, 한번도 말로 풀어본 적이 없는 것을 표현하면서 조금 비틀거렸어요. 실수한 점 사과드립니다.

올랜도 총기 사건은 정말 끔찍했어요. 그리고 저를 가장 괴롭게 하는 건, 수차례의 총기 사건을 겪을 때마다 우리가 공포에 질렸다가 금세 현실에 안주한다는 거예요. 저를 포함해서요.

총기 규제가 문제를 해결할 수 있을지 모르겠어요. 이 문제는 그것보다 더 복잡한 것 같거든요.

정확히 뭘 해야 할지 모르겠어요.

하지만 할 수 있는 일은 알아요.

Jimmy Fallon의 이야기도 무척 좋답니다:
https://www.facebook.com/FallonTonight/videos/10154292540968896/?pnref=story

title: How to Take Notes!  Prepping for Finals Part 1
description:
A video on encoding/recoding: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9YUpCf65H8

A similar notetaking technique, Cornell Notes: http://coe.jmu.edu/learningtoolbox/cornellnotes.html

Cornell Notes works in reverse, which means you take organized notes on the right and go back and write out your "cues" later.

CHAPTERS: 
00:00 - Topic Intro: Memory, Note Taking, Studying & Taking Tests
00:15 - Clarifying the Long Term vs Short Term Memory Misconception! 
01:09 - What Working Memory Is
01:35 - Working Memory, Encoding & Recoding
02:15 - Why Note Taking Can Help
02:36 - How ADHD Can Impact Note Taking
03:09 - What Can Tend To Happen & Why It Often Doesn't Work
03:42 - What's A Brain To Do? 
04:41 - Two Final Tips!
05:09 - Video Wrap-Up & Outro

title: My 10 Favorite Online Resources for ADHD
description:
There's a lot of resources out there for ADHD, so where should you start?  Here's a list of my 10 favorite online resources for ADHD!  (So far! )

1. http://facebook.com/howtoadhd (one of the support groups available on Facebook was started by one of the brains! It's new but he's fantastic, check it out --- I'm on there too! https://www.facebook.com/groups/646802448791740/)

3. http://add.about.com/
4. http://add.org
5. http://adhdtogether.com/adhd-resources
6. http://kidsinthehouse.com/search/site/ADHD%20DR%20Hallowell#
7. http://additudemag.com
8. http://twitter.com/howtoadhd
9. https://www.reddit.com/r/ADHD/

oh and 11! totallyadd.com is SO GOOD and so funny :D

Also, other countries:
Canada: http://www.caddra.ca

title: ADHD in Girls: How to Recognize the Symptoms
description:
In this video I highlight the different ways ADHD symptoms tend to express themselves in girls. For a better sense of ADHD in general check out "How to Know if You Have ADHD:"  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx13a2-unjE

To clarify: I am not suggesting that there is a "girl" or a "boy" form of ADHD. Any gender can have the hyperactivity component, and any gender can be primarily inattentive. In this video I talk about what is more common; however, it's important that we learn to recognize both forms in all genders. 

ADHD in girls: What You Need to Know: https://www.understood.org/en/learning-attention-issues/child-learning-disabilities/add-adhd/adhd-in-girls?gclid=EAIaIQobChMI4vHZtbPE2gIVDjBpCh26BAHJEAAYAiAAEgJ9pvD_BwE

Lost Generation of Women: https://qz.com/592364/decades-of-failing-to-recognize-adhd-in-girls-has-created-a-lost-generation-of-women/

ADD Women and Girls: Late ADHD Diagnosis, Little Treatment (ADDitude magazine): http://bit.ly/23Clh2H

Diagnosing ADHD Girls (ADDitude magazine): http://bit.ly/1Nn8sjq

Neuropsychiatric differences between boys and girls with ADHD (Psychiatric Times): http://bit.ly/1VkBuHW

CHAPTERS: 
00:00 - Intro & Find The ADHDer! 
00:46 - Why DOES ADHD go unnoticed in girls? 
02:37 - How do we know what to look for? 
04:01 - Video Wrap-Up & Outro! 

"The Show Must Be Go,” 
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0

localizations.fr.title: Le TDAH chez les filles : Comment reconnaître les symptômes
localizations.fr.description:
Dans cette vidéo, j’expose les différentes façons dont les symptômes du TDAH tendent à se présenter chez les filles. Pour avoir une meilleure idée du TDAH en général, jetez un œil sur « How to Know if You Have ADHD : » https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx13a2-unjE

Petite précision : Je ne prétends pas qu’il existe une forme de TDAH pour les « filles » et une pour les « garçons ». Les deux sexes peuvent présenter l’élément d’hyperactivité, et ils peuvent également être principalement inattentifs. Dans cette vidéo, je discute de ce qui est le plus commun. Par contre, il est important que nous apprenions à reconnaître les deux formes chez les deux sexes. 

Lost Generation of Women: https://qz.com/592364/decades-of-failing-to-recognize-adhd-in-girls-has-created-a-lost-generation-of-women/
ADD Women and Girls: Late ADHD Diagnosis, Little Treatment (ADDitude magazine): http://bit.ly/23Clh2H
Diagnosing ADHD Girls (ADDitude magazine): http://bit.ly/1Nn8sjq
Neuropsychiatric differences between boys and girls with ADHD (Psychiatric Times): http://bit.ly/1VkBuHW

“The Show Must Be Go,” 
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Publié sous une licence Creative Commons : Par Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0
localizations.it.title: ADHD nelle ragazze: Come riconoscere i sintomi
localizations.it.description:
In questo video parlo di come i sintomi della sindrome da deficit di attenzione (ADHD) si manifestano nelle ragazze. Per una panoramica più completa sulla sindrome da deficit di attenzione guarda "Come capire se sei affetto da ADHD": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx13a2-unjE

Per essere chiara. non intendo dire che c'è una forma di ADHD al maschile ed una al femminile. Entrambi  i sessi possono presentare una componente iperattiva, così come entrambi i sessi possono essere principalmente distratti. In questo video parlo di cosa accade più spesso; ciò nonostante, è fondamentale imparare a riconoscere entrambe le forme in entrambi i sessi. 

Lost Generation of Women: https://qz.com/592364/decades-of-failing-to-recognize-adhd-in-girls-has-created-a-lost-generation-of-women/
ADD Women and Girls: Late ADHD Diagnosis, Little Treatment (ADDitude magazine): http://bit.ly/23Clh2H
Diagnosing ADHD Girls (ADDitude magazine): http://bit.ly/1Nn8sjq
Neuropsychiatric differences between boys and girls with ADHD (Psychiatric Times): http://bit.ly/1VkBuHW

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0
localizations.ko.title: 여아들의 ADHD : 증상을 알아보는 법
localizations.ko.description:
이 영상에서는 ADHD 증상이 여아들에게서 어떻게 나타나는지 알아보는 방법들을 조명합니다. ADHD 전반에 관해 더 알아보려면 이 영상을 확인하세요. "ADHD가 있는지 알아보는 방법How to Know if You Have ADHD" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx13a2-unjE

분명히 하기 위해 밝힙니다: 여자와 남자 형태의 ADHD가 따로 있다는 이야기를 하는 게 아닙니다. 어느 성별이든지 과잉행동 양상이 있을 수 있고, 어떤 성별이나 일차적으로 주의력 결핍일 수 있습니다. 이 영상에서는 어떤 것이 더 흔히 나타나는가에 대해 말합니다. 그렇지만 두 성별에서 발현되는 다른 형태를 모두 알아볼 수 있는 것이 중요합니다.

추가자료

localizations.pl.title: ADHD u dziewcząt: Jak rozpoznać objawy
localizations.pl.description:
W tym filmie zwracam uwagę na różne sposoby, w jakie ADHD może objawiać się u dziewczyn. Aby dowiedzieć się, czym w ogóle jest ADHD, zajrzyj na "Jak sprawdzić, czy masz ADHD:" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx13a2-unjE~~HEAD=pobj

Dla wyjaśnienia: Nie sugeruję, że nie istnieje żeńska czy męska forma ADHD. U osób każdej płci może występować komponent nadpobudliwości lub problemów z koncentracją. W tym filmie chcę mówić o tym, co jest bardziej powszechne; jednak ważne jest, aby nauczyć się rozpoznawać obydwie formy u obu płci. 

Stracone pokolenia kobiet: https://qz.com/592364/decades-of-failing-to-recognize-adhd-in-girls-has-created-a-lost-generation-of-women/
ADD kobiet i dziewcząt: Późne diagnoza, mało leczenia (magazyn ADDitude): http://bit.ly/23Clh2H
Diagnozowanie ADHD u dziewcząt (magazyn ADDitude): http://bit.ly/1Nn8sjq
Neuropsychiatryczne różnice między chłopcami i dziewczętami z ADHD (Psychiatric Times): http://bit.ly/1VkBuHW

title: How to Set Boundaries in Six Easy Steps
description:
Do you have trouble saying no? Yeah, me too. This week, let's set some boundaries. 

By the way, if you need to compromise your boundaries to keep your friends...those aren't real friends. Real friends want you to be happy, and while they might be disappointed if you can't give them what they want, they should understand that you have needs too.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: http://twitter.com/howtoadhd

CHAPTERS: 
00:00 - Intro & Limited Resources! 
00:30 - Why is it hard to say no?
00:47 - Boundaries! What's a boundary? 
01:41 - About Setting Boundaries 
02:04 - Healthy vs Unhealthy Boundaries
03:21 - Let's Set A Boundary! 
04:22 - Video Wrap-Up & Outro! 

"The Show Must Be Go,” 
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

title: How to Adult When You Have ADHD
description:
In which I talk about how to adult when you have ADHD. If, you know, adulting is the kind of thing you're into. I prefer to never grow up. But then again...

UPDATE! My favorite "secretary:" my bullet journal: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jkZEEQG6IVE

My favorite simple to do app: https://teuxdeux.com/

Zen to Done – A simpler, calmer version of "Getting Things Done" http://bit.ly/1prHIcv

Fun sticky note to do list: http://amzn.to/1UwxWB0

But honestly, a lot of the time I just use the notepad in my phone, list what I need to do today, and put smiley emojis after every one I complete :D

title: How to Know if You Have ADHD
description:
I'm not a doctor, but here are some things you need to know.

UPDATE: the three "types" as described by the DSM IV have been updated to be called "presentations" -- inattentive presentation, etc. to better represent the fluidity of symptoms and their ability to change over time.

Test for adult ADHD (from additudemag.com):http://bit.ly/21yRB96
ADHD test designed specifically for women (from additudemag.com): http://bit.ly/1pmtxoz & https://www.additudemag.com/self-test-adhd-symptoms-women-girls/

(video) A really funny, painfully accurate "unofficial test" by Totally ADD: http://bit.ly/1SeF6tj

Recently diagnosed? You might be feeling like this: http://bit.ly/1LS06PU

CHAPTERS: 
00:00 - Intro
00:13 - What is ADHD?
00:37 - How does this apply to real life?
01:37 - How can I tell if it might be ADHD?
02:28 - Five things you need to know!  
03:37 - Video Wrap-up & Outro

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0

localizations.de.title: Wie Du herausfindest, ob Du ADHS hast
localizations.de.description:
Ich bin zwar kein Arzt, aber hier sind ein paar Dinge, die du wissen solltest.

UPDATE: Die drei im DSM IV beschriebenen "Typen" wurden überarbeitet und werden nun "presentations" (im Sinne von Beschreibung, Auslegung) genannt -- inattentive presentation (unaufmerksam), etc., um den fließenden Übergang der Symptome und ihr Fähigkeit sich mit der Zeit zu ändern, zu  beschreiben.

ADHS-Test für Erwachsene (von additudemag.com): http://bit.ly/21yRB96
ADHS-Test speziell für Frauen (von additudemag.com): http://bit.ly/1pmtxoz

(video) Ein echt witziger, zum Teil schmerzhaft zutreffender "Inoffizieller Test" von Totally ADD: http://bit.ly/1SeF6tj

Hast du deine Diagnose gerade erst vor kurzem bekommen? Dann fühlst du dich vielleicht so: http://bit.ly/1LS06PU

(Alle Links sind in englischer Sprache)

"The Show Must Be Go,” “Latin Industries”
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0
localizations.sv.title: Hur vet du om du har ADHD?
localizations.sv.description:
Jag är ingen läkare, men här är några saker du behöver veta.

UPPDATERING: de tre "typer" som beskrivs av DSM IV har uppdaterats för att kallas "presentationer" - ouppmärksam presentation, etc. för att bättre representera symptomens fluiditet och deras förmåga att förändras över tiden.

Test för vuxen-ADHD (från additudemag.com): http: //bit.ly/21yRB96
ADHD-test som utformats speciellt för kvinnor (från additudemag.com): http://bit.ly/1pmtxoz

(Video) En riktigt rolig, plågsamt exakt "inofficiellt test" av Totally ADD: http://bit.ly/1SeF6tj

Nyligen diagnosticerad? Du kanske känner så här: http://bit.ly/1LS06PU

localizations.id.title: Cara untuk tahu jika kamu punya ADHD
localizations.id.description:
Aku bukan dokter, tapi berikut hal-hal yang perlu kamu tahu.

UPDATE: Tiga "tipe" seperti yang dijelaskan oleh the DSM IV telah diperbarui untuk disebut "presentations" -- presentasi kurang memperhatikan, dll. untuk merepresentasikan gejala yang berubah-ubah dan kemampuan untuk berubah seiring waktu.

Test for adult ADHD (from additudemag.com):http://bit.ly/21yRB96
ADHD test designed specifically for women (from additudemag.com): http://bit.ly/1pmtxoz

(video) A really funny, painfully accurate "unofficial test" by Totally ADD: http://bit.ly/1SeF6tj

Recently diagnosed? You might be feeling like this: http://bit.ly/1LS06PU

localizations.sk.title: Ako zistiť, či máte ADHD
localizations.sk.description:
Nie som lekár, ale tu je pár vecí, ktoré by ste mali vedieť. 

AKTUALIZÁCIA: tri typy ADHD opísané v DSM IV boli aktualizované a teraz sa im hovorí "prezentácia" (anglicky "presentation", napr. nepozorná prezentácia, atď.) Zmenené to bolo aby sa lepšie poukázalo na fluidity symptómov a ich schopnosť zmeniť sa po čase.

Test pre ADHD dospelých (z additudemag.com a po anglicky): http://bit.ly/21yRB96
ADHD test navrhnutý špeciálne pre ženy (z additudemag.com a po anglicky): http://bit.ly/1pmtxoz

(video) Veľmi vtipný a až bolestne presný "neoficiálny test" od Totally ADD:
http://bit.ly/1SeF6tj

Boli ste nedávno diagnostikovaní? Možno sa cítite takto: http://bit.ly/1LS06PU

title: ADHD and Relationships: Let's Be Honest
description:
This week, I address one of the biggest problems in ADHD relationships that no one seems to talk about. 

Disclaimer: to be clear, when I talk about the things we do to preserve the dopamine high, I am NOT saying everyone with ADHD does any or all of these. This part of the video is based heavily on my personal experience. Although those of us with ADHD are certainly more prone to boredom and risk-taking behavior, having ADHD is not an indicator of whether or not a person will cheat.

Read more about dopamine!
http://www.simplywellbeing.com/under-...

Four things ADHD brains can focus on taken from:
Puryear, Douglas A. Your Life Can Be Better, Using Strategies for Adult ADD/ADHD. Mill City Press, Inc. 2012. 
http://www.amazon.com/Your-Better-Using-Strategies-Adult/dp/1937600432/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1463612451&sr=8-1&keywords=your+life+can+be+better+douglas

Ask me questions or suggest a topic!
Facebook: https://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: https://twitter.com/howtoadhd 

CHAPTERS: 
00:00 - Topic Intro: ADHD & Relationships! 
00:54 - What's Not Often Talked About With ADHD & Relationships? 
01:08 - Cool Science Stuff! Why we get bored/disinterested!
02:10 - What Using Relationships For Dopamine Can Look Like
03:20 - Option H: Honesty 
04:09 - What can honesty bring? 
05:25 - Video Wrap Up & Outro

localizations.it.title: ADHD e Relazioni: Siamo Onesti
localizations.it.description:
Questa settimana, mi occupo di uno dei maggiorni problemi nelle relazioni ADHD di cui nessuno sembra parlare.

Disclaimer: per essere chiari, quando parlo delle cose che facciamo per mantenere alta la dopamina, NON sto dicendo che tutti quelli con l'ADHD fanno alcune o tutte queste cose. Questa parte del video è basata principalmente sulla mia esperienza personale. Sebbene quelli di noi con l'ADHD sono certamente inclini alla noia e ai comportamenti rischiosi, avere l'ADHD non indica se è incline o meno al tradimento.
localizations.ko.title: ADHD와 연애: 솔직해지기
localizations.ko.description:
이번 주에는 ADHD와 관계에 대해 아무도 말하지 않는, 가장 큰 문제에 대해 다뤄 볼 거예요.

주의: 분명히 하자면, 제가 ADHD를 가진 사람들이 도파민 레벨을 높이 유지하기 위해서 하는 일에 대해 말할 때, ADHD를 가진 모든 사람들이 그 일들의 일부 혹은 전부를 한다는 말은 아닙니다. 이 부분은 전적으로 저의 개인적인 경험에 기초했습니다. ADHD를 가진 사람들이 쉽게 지루해고, 리스크가 높은 행동을 하는 경향이 분명히 있지만, ADHD가 있느냐 없느냐로 한 사람이 바람을 피울 것인가 아닌가를 알 수는 없습니다.

도파민에 대해 더 읽어 보세요!
http://www.simplywellbeing.com/adhd-resources/what-is-adhd/

ADHD 뇌가 집중할 수 있는 네 가지의 출처: 
Puryear, Douglas A. Your Life Can Be Better, Using Strategies for Adult ADD/ADHD. Mill City Press, Inc. 2012. 
http://www.amazon.com/Your-Better-Using-Strategies-Adult/dp/1937600432/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1463612451&sr=8-1&keywords=your+life+can+be+better+douglas

질문이나 주제 제안을 해 주세요!

localizations.pt-BR.description:
TDAH e Relacionamentos: Vamos Ser Honestos

Esta semana, eu abordo um dos maiores problemas nos relacionamentos com TDAH que ninguém parece comentar.

Aviso Legal: para ser clara, quando eu falo sobre as coisas que nós fazemos para preservar a alta dopamina, eu NÃO estou dizendo que todos com TDAH fazem qualquer ou todas elas. Esta parte do vídeo é baseada fortemente em minha experiência pessoal. Entretanto, aqueles de nós com TDAH, estão certamente mais propensas ao tédio e comportamento de risco. Ter TDAH não é um indicativo de que a pessoa irá, ou não, trair.

Leia mais sobre dopamina!
http://www.simplywellbeing.com/under-...

Quatro coisas que cérebros com TDAH podem focar, foi tirado do:
Puryear, Douglas A. Your Life Can Be Better, Using Strategies for Adult ADD/ADHD. Mill City Press, Inc. 2012. 
http://www.amazon.com/Your-Better-Using-Strategies-Adult/dp/1937600432/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1463612451&sr=8-1&keywords=your+life+can+be+better+douglas

Me faça perguntas ou sugestões de tópicos!
Facebook: https://facebook.com/howtoadhd
Twitter: https://twitter.com/howtoadhd 

Música:
“The Future Begins Today” 
by Brett Van Donsel

“Resignation“

title: Are You Impulsive? How Meditation Can Help
description:
Don't run away, brains!  Meditation is easier than you think. 

Ask me questions!
Facebook: http://facebook.com/HowtoADHD
Twitter: http://twitter.com/HowtoADHD

Meditation 101 (animated!): http://bit.ly/1WrQYru

The Scientific Power of Meditation (animated!): http://bit.ly/1RRBAFX

Intro to Zen Meditation: http://bit.ly/1WrH358

description:

title: How to Keep Focused on Your Goals in the New Year!
description:
Setting and keeping goals can be hard for anyone, but it's especially hard for those of us with ADHD! Here I explain Dr. Amen's technique for goal setting that really works.

Download the One Page Miracle (pdf): http://bit.ly/1OHxLMn

Check out Dr. Amen's website: http://brainmdhealth.com/?utm_source=Google&utm_medium=CPC&utm_term=dr%20amen&utm_content=%7Badid%7D&utm_campaign=BMDH+SUS+-+Dr.+Amen&gclid=CKPu2cqimMoCFVJufgodloQJjw

Let me know what you think!
Friend me on Facebook: http://facebook.com/HowtoADHD
Talk to me on Twitter: http://twitter.com/HowtoADHD

localizations.it.title: Come Rimanere Concentrati sui Tuoi Obiettivi nell'Anno Nuovo!
localizations.it.description:
Impostare e mantenere gli obiettivi può essere difficile per chiunque, ma è particolarmente difficile per quelli di noi con l'ADHD! Qui spiego la tecnica del Dott. Amens per l'impostazione degli obiettivi che funziona davvero.

Scarica la One Page Miracle (pdf): http://bit.ly/10HxLMn

Dai un'occhiata al sito del Dott. Amens: http://brainmdhealth.com/?utm_source=Google&utm_medium=CPC&utm_term=dr%20amen&utm_content=%7Badid%7D&utm_campaign=BMDH+SUS+-+Dr.+Amen&gclid=CKPu2cqimMoCFVJufgodloQJjw

Fammi sapere cosa ne pensi!
Metti mi piace sulla mia pagina Facebook: http://facebook.com/HowtoADHD
Parlami su Twitter: http://twitter.com/HowtoADHD

"The Show Must Be Go"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Come Rimanere Concentrati sui Tuoi Obiettivi nell'Anno Nuovo!
localizations.es-419.title: ¡Cómo mantenerte enfocado en tus metas de Año Nuevo!
localizations.es-419.description:
Establecer y mantener metas puede ser difícil para cualquiera, ¡pero es especialmente difícil para aquellos de nosotros con TDAH! Aquí explico una técnica del Dr. Amen para establecer metas que realmente funciona.

Descarga el milagro de una página (pdf): http://bit.ly/1OHxLMn

Visita el sitio web del Dr. Amen: http://brainmdhealth.com/?utm_source=Google&utm_medium=CPC&utm_term=dr%20amen&utm_content=%7Badid%7D&utm_campaign=BMDH+SUS+-+Dr.+Amen&gclid=CKPu2cqimMoCFVJufgodloQJjw

¡Déjame saber que piensas!
Sígueme en Facebook: http://facebook.com/HowtoADHD
Habla conmigo en Twitter: http://twitter.com/HowtoADHD
